name: Color Castle
technology: React.JS, Node.JS, Express,MongoDB, React Bootstrap, React-Router, Heroku, CSS, Stripe, Firebase Authentication
desc: In this website Implemented a dashboard where the admin can add brands and manage orders by the customers. Users can order products and they can cancel their orders if they want. Implemented a payment method where users can pay for buying products using stripe.

name: Holiday Planner
technology: React.JS, Node.JS, Express,MongoDB, React Bootstrap, React-Router, Heroku, CSS, Firebase Authentication
desc: On this travel agency website, users can buy their favorite travel packages after logging in. As the admin panel is not implemented, the admin and user both can add more travel packages.Users can update their order status and also cancel it if they want.
